suites.title: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Appointment Details page of "Awaiting Time" appointment by clicking on the eye icon against that appointment
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Appointment Details page of "Awaiting Time" appointment by clicking on the eye icon against that appointment

tests.title: At "Appointment details" page each label and field should have proper label and validations
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases At "Appointment details" page each label and field should have proper label and validations

tests.title: The unique appointment id should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases The unique appointment id should be displayed

tests.title: The date requested by the patient should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases The date requested by the patient should be displayed

tests.title: The Service Address where the patient requested the service should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases The Service Address where the patient requested the service should be displayed

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the medical history page of particular patient by clicking on the name card of that particular patient
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the medical history page of particular patient by clicking on the name card of that particular patient

tests.title: The list of services requested by the patient should be displayed
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases The list of services requested by the patient should be displayed

tests.title: As a Admin the user can Add "Comment for Provider" By clicking on the "Edit" icon against it.
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user can Add "Comment for Provider" By clicking on the "Edit" icon against it.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can assign a provider to the Appointment By clicking on the "Assign Provider" button
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user can assign a provider to the Appointment By clicking on the "Assign Provider" button

tests.title: At "Assign provider" page each label and field should have proper label and validations
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases At "Assign provider" page each label and field should have proper label and validations

tests.title: As a Admin the user can add comments for the provider at the time of assigning the provider
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user can add comments for the provider at the time of assigning the provider

tests.title: After filling Assign provider form and clicking on "Assign" button the provider should be assigned and status should be changed to provider assigned
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases After filling Assign provider form and clicking on "Assign" button the provider should be assigned and status should be changed to provider assigned

tests.title: As a Admin the user can cancel the appointment after entering the cancellation reason by clicking on the cancel button
tests.fullTitle: Awaiting Time Appointment Details Test cases As a Admin the user can cancel the appointment after entering the cancellation reason by clicking on the cancel button
